oldCallflows.please_select_valid_number: Please select a valid number by click in the grey boxes of the Callflow box.
oldCallflows.this_callflow_has_not_been_created: This callflow has not been created or doesn\'t exist anymore.
oldCallflows.monster_callflow_error: This callflow was created via the Monster UI. At this time, the Kazoo UI callflow editor is not compatible to edit Monster-UI Callflows.
oldCallflows.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to delete this callflow?
oldCallflows.giving_a_name_to_a_callflow: Giving a name to a callflow isn't mandatory. Leave the field blank and the callflow will be displayed in the left listing as the list of numbers used in this callflow.
oldCallflows.you_didnt_select: You didn\'t select a valid phone number.
oldCallflows.this_number_is_already_attached: This number is already attached to a callflow
oldCallflows.ring_group_tip: Ring several VoIP or cell phones in order or at the same time
oldCallflows.callflow_tip: Transfer the call to another call flow
oldCallflows.page_group_tip: Ring several VoIP or cell phones
oldCallflows.group_pickup_tip: Setup the group pickup feature for a user, device or a group.
oldCallflows.receive_fax_tip: Directs a fax to a specific user
oldCallflows.disa_tip: DISA allows external callers to make outbound calls as though they originated from the system
oldCallflows.response_tip: Return a custom SIP error code
oldCallflows.enable_call_forwarding_tip: Enable call forwarding (using the last forwaded number)
oldCallflows.dynamic_cid_tip: Set your CallerId by entering it on the phone
oldCallflows.prepend_tip: Prepend Caller ID with a text.
oldCallflows.reset_prepend_tip: Reset all the prepended texts before the Caller ID.
oldCallflows.you_have_modified_this_callflow: You have modified this Callflow, don't forget to save it!
oldCallflows.drag_items_below_on_top: Drag items below on top of other items on the left
oldCallflows.connect_caller_to_another_callflow: Connect a caller to another callflow...
oldCallflows.sends_fax_to_user: Sends a fax to a user...
oldCallflows.by_checking_this_box: By checking this box, this endpoint will not be added automatically to the contact list of the devices of this platform
oldCallflows.you_need_to_select_a_number: You need to select a number for this callflow before saving it.
oldCallflows.the_owner_of_this_device_is_already: The owner of this device is already in the ring group. By adding this device, you will remove the User from this ring group. Would you like to continue anyway?
oldCallflows.this_user_has_already_some_devices: This user has already some devices belonging to him in this ring group. By adding him to the ring group, you will remove devices that were already in the ring group. Would you like to continue anyway?
oldCallflows.not_setting_a_pin: Not setting a PIN is a security risk, are you sure you don\'t want to set a PIN?
oldCallflows.please_enter_a_valide_sip_code: Please enter a valide SIP code.
oldCallflows.this_callflow_is_outdated: This callflow is outdated, please resave this callflow before continuing.
oldCallflows.language_tip: This callflow action lets you change the language of the prompts used in this callflow!
